Package com.inexture.DAO

Class DaoMethods

java.lang.Object
com.inexture.DAO.DaoMethods
All Implemented Interfaces:
DaoInterface
public class DaoMethods extends Object implements DaoInterface
User Dao Implementation class. Implements the methods related to create, update, read, delete user's data from database table.
Author:
Yash

    • authUser

      public UserBean authUser(String email, String password)
      Description copied from interface: DaoInterface
      This method checks if user is present in database table or not based on given email, password. If User is present then it returns user bean object filled with all the details of user. Else it returns null.
      Specified by:
      authUser in interface DaoInterface
      Parameters:
      email - - email of user
      password - - encrypted password of user
      Returns:
      u - User bean object null - if no user found in table
